titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious declaration to his good people of his ancient kingdom of Scotland commanding their assistance against the Prince and Princess of Orange, and their adherents.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"Given at our Court at S. Germans the twentieth day of Aprill in the eight year of our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
